name: Tejas Bubane
bio: I like the way javascript(ecmascript) has evolved in the recent years - its been a joy to program in. I learnt a lot of good practices in Javascript while solving exercises on exercism and later started using it to mentor people in my workplace. Now I am really excited to do it on a wider scale!

name: Brenton Alker
bio: JavaScript is a gateway into software development for so many. I've been developing for the web in various forms for about 15 years and I hope to share some of my experience to help other navigate this learning journey.
